entry.def: When a country industrializes or is industrialized, it develops a lot of industries.

example.ex: Energy consumption rises as countries industrialise...
example.tran: 随着各国实现工业化,能源消费增加了。

example.ex: Stalin's methods had industrialized the Russian economy...
example.tran: 斯大林采取的措施使俄国经济实现了工业化。

means.word_mean: 1. the development of industry on an extensive scale

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,由-ize+-ation组成,"……化"或"发展过程"

stems_affixes.word_buile: central中心的,中央的+ization……化→n.集中,中央集权化
industrial工业的,产业的+ization……化→n.工业化,产业化
organ器官,组织+ization……化→n.组织,团体,机构
